trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Manson
There was one other sighting in Manson on or around April 10th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in my room with my friend listening to music (Like always) and my dad was on the deck (Like Always) and he yelled "MacKenzie! Sabrinna! I just saw a UFO go over the Lake! (We have a great veiw of the the Lake Chelan)" Me and Sabrinna hopped out my window(Which goes strait onto the deck) Me and Sabrinna looked up into the sky, and there as a UFO flying away, we watched it for about 2-3 minutes and then it dissapeared into space! We were amazed to see it! We never thought that we would see one in our lives! We had wanted to see one forever! And we finally got to see one!
Summary: A UFO passed right infront of my house!
